name: MC Caro
description:
'''Caroline Moore''', better known as '''MC Caro''', is a [[Liberia]]n rapper and songwriter.
 She gained recognition in the Liberian music industry after releasing the viral [[freestyle rap]] song "Pro Poor". MC Caro won Best Female Rapper of the Year at the 2020 [[Liberia Music Awards]]. She has released the albums ''King Caro'' (2021), ''My Way'' (2023), and ''Still Broke'' (2024).
